Book Comments: The book introduces the core libraries essential for working with data in Python

Books_Table.Book Authors: Steven Bird, Ewan Klein, and Edward Loper
Book Comments: This is a book about Natural Language Processing. By
we mean a language that is used for everyday communication by humans
This book will teach you how to do data science with R: You’ll learn how to get your data into R, get it into the most useful structure, transform it, visualise it and model it
